description: Gaussian binomial coefficient [ n,11 ] for q=-7.
references: J. Goldman and G.-C. Rota, The number of subspaces of a vector space, pp. 75-83 of W. T. Tutte, editor, Recent Progress in Combinatorics. Academic Press, NY, 1969.
I. P. Goulden and D. M. Jackson, Combinatorial Enumeration. Wiley, NY, 1983, p, 99.
M. Sved, Gaussians and binomials, Ars. Combinatoria, 17A (1984), 325-351.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 11..120
formula: a(n) = product(((-7)^(n-i+1)-1)/((-7)^i-1), i=1..11) (by definition). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 06 2012
prog: (Sage) [gaussian_binomial(n,11,-7) for n in xrange(11,17)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 28 2009](MAGMA) r:=11; q:=-7; [&*[(1-q^(n-i+1))/(1-q^i): i in [1..r]]: n in [r..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 06 2012
author: _Olivier GÃ©rard_
